description.black-white:
An inferno of scarlet flames torches
everything around the user. It may
leave targets with a burn.
description.black-2-white-2:
An inferno of scarlet flames torches
everything around the user. It may
leave targets with a burn.
description.x-y:
The user torches everything around it
with an inferno of scarlet flames.
This may also leave those hit with a burn.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target.
effect.shortEffect: Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target.
